game.beginning: In a world where magic has disappeared, the land of Eridoria is plagued by a catastrophic event known as "The Great Devastation".
game.ending: The hero, with the help of their companions, manages to defeat the true enemy behind the devastation and restore balance to the land.
game.synopsis: In a desperate bid to save their world, a young orphan named Lyra embarks on a perilous journey to unite the warring nations against a common threat. Along the way, she discovers her own hidden past and the secrets behind the Great Devastation. With the help of a ragtag group of allies, Lyra must overcome treacherous landscapes, fickle allegiances, and ancient magical forces to prevent the destruction of Eridoria.
game.title: Eridoria's Requiem
